inclusion.criterion: Patients at Charité - Universitaetsmedizin Berlin, Campus Charité Mitte
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Primary diagnosis of unilateral head or neck cancer
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Resection of Tumor is planned with unilateral neck dissection
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient did not underwent any therapeutic treatment of the cancer before start of study
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Surgical therapy is planned with curative intent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Lack of consent that pseudonomized data of the study may be saved and distributed
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Coagulation disorders, which can lead to complications in regional anesthesia
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Medication with immunosuppressants or immune modulantia
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 75 yo M w/ metastatic papillary thyroid cancer s/p XRT, worsening dysphagia for solids, poor oral intake, weight loss 20 pounds over last several weeks and some lethargy.
